page.title: 11COMMUNICATIONS, West Cambs.
page.content:
Mail is delivered from Peterborough Sorting Office via van from Huntingdon
Catworth Post Office also serves the villages of Molesworth and Tilbrook by opening in their Village Halls on half days - Wednesday and Saturday respect- ively.
Kimbolton, Tilbrook and Covington come under Huntingdon Telephone Exchange - Catworth, Brington and Leighton Broms- wold come under Bythorn Exchange in Northampton District, Leicester Area.
Parcels also delivered locally by the Stagecoach Bus Service, see TRANSPORT. Prescriptions collected from Surgery (Kimbolton and Alconbury) and left as pre-arranged in village. Small charge for both these services.
